My Projects

Check out some of my Projects......

Description

  • This is a full CRUD E Commerce web application,Built using MERN Stack
  • This was a learning project to learn the basic concepts and workflow of Redux and integrating NodeJS backend with frontend

Features

  • User registration, authentication, authorization and login
  • Place order and payment through paypal api(sandbox account)
  • Store address and details,view and update your profile
  • Write and review any product
  • Admin funtionality to update products and orders as delivered and maintain users
  • JWT tokens are used for security purpose(authentication and authorization)

Tech Stack

  • ReactJS
  • Redux
  • React-Bootstrap
  • NodeJS
  • ExpressJS
  • Mongoose(MongoDB)
Project Github

Description

  • This is a simple Weather Tracker web application,Built using ReactJS and axios
  • This was a learning project to learn the basic concepts of fetching data from API wiht axios and to use remote APIs

Features

  • Simple UI with a searchbox to search from places to find weather
  • Get all weather details on a click like Temperature,Humidity etc.

Tech Stack

  • ReactJS
  • Axios
  • NodeJS
  • ExpressJS
  • Weather API
Project Github

Description

  • This is a simple full CRUD TodoList,Built using MERN Stack

Features

  • User registration, authentication, authorization and login
  • Add,Delete,Edit your day to day tasks
  • Store tasks using MongoDB
  • JWT tokens are used for security purpose(authentication and authorization)

Tech Stack

  • ReactJS
  • Redux
  • React-Bootstrap
  • NodeJS
  • ExpressJS
  • Mongoose(MongoDB)

Project Github

Description

  • This is a basic disappearing chat website
  • This was a learning project to learn the concepts of socket.io

Features

  • Join any room and have a realtime chat with people having same interests
  • Has a Bot feature which notifies you when someone joins or left the chat

Tech Stack

  • Socket.io
  • NodeJS
  • ExpressJS
